title: Bug 129561HCGBIDI: Undesirable generation of SQL query elements
description:
Bug 129561HCGBIDI: Undesirable generation of SQL query elements. This is not even NLS specific defect. Otherwise, the query will fail.
1. Create a table with a name that includes a blank space in this database.
2. Select 'Preview Results'.
Result: An exception is fired.
7. 'Table Name'. 'Column Name'

It happens with English as well. The problem is that on the Query screen in the Edit Data Set dialog, the drag/drop of columns into the Query screen must enclose every entity name, including blank spaces, in quotation marks.

Select 'Preview Results'.
Result: No exception is issued.
OB: The drag/drop of columns into the Query screen in the Edit Data Set dialog does not enclose every entity name, including blank spaces, in quotation marks.
EB: The drag/drop of columns into the Query screen in the Edit Data Set dialog should enclose every entity name, including blank spaces, in quotation marks.
SR:
1. Create a table with a name that includes a blank space in this database.
2. Select 'Preview Results'.
3. Observe the exception being fired.
4. Drag and drop columns into the Query screen in the Edit Data Set dialog.
5. Select 'Preview Results'.
6. Observe that no exception is issued.
